description.message: Block leaks and spoilers about HoYoverse games on Bilibili, YouTube, Twitter, etc.

options_subtitle.message: Configure blocking rules and manage area settings

areas_subtitle.message: Manage blocking area settings for different platforms

export_description.message: Export current configuration to JSON file

clear_warning.message: ⚠️ This operation will clear all configuration and data, cannot be undone

about_description.message: This is a browser extension specifically designed for players of games under miHoYo (Hoyoverse), such as Genshin Impact, Honkai: Star Rail, Zenless Zone Zero, etc. It can automatically block content related to "leaks and smear campaigns" on major social platforms like Bilibili, YouTube, and Twitter (x.com).

about_thanks.message: Thanks: This project is refactored from the original Tampermonkey script developed by @凡云 on Bilibili. Thanks to the original author for the open source contribution!

feature_2.message: 🔍 Smart recognition: Automatic identification of leak content through keywords and usernames

feature_3.message: ⚡ Real-time blocking: Real-time monitoring and automatic blocking of page content

feature_4.message: 📝 Custom rules: Support for custom keywords and blacklist/whitelist

feature_5.message: 🎯 Area management: Visual management of blocking areas with precise control

feature_6.message: 💾 Configuration management: Support for import/export, remote updates, and cloud sync

feature_7.message: 🎨 Modern UI: Clean and intuitive settings and popup interface

feature_9.message: 🛠️ Performance optimization: Debounce/throttle with low resource usage

feature_10.message: 🔐 Data security: Local storage, no user data uploaded

feature_11.message: 🌐 Internationalization: Multi-language interface (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, etc.)

usage_1.message: After installing the extension, a blue floating button will appear on the right side of the page

usage_2.message: Click the browser toolbar icon to quickly toggle the blocking function

usage_3.message: Click the floating button or right-click menu to enter the "Options" page

usage_4.message: Customize keywords, blacklist/whitelist, areas, etc. in the settings page

contact_description.message: For questions or suggestions, please visit:

popup_subtitle.message: Block Genshin Impact and Star Rail leaks
